name: IdemoMotors
0:
”Alexa, raise Kitchen”
”Alexa, turn off Living Room”
”Alexa, close Awning”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill will allow you to control your Idemo devices from Alexa, such as blinds, venetian blinds, awnings, etc.

To be able to use it, you'll need to first install the IdehomeNeo app, create an account, and configure your devices.

To activate the skill, you'll be asked for the credentials you use in the IdehomeNeo app. Once you link the skill to your IdehomeNeo account, you can ask Alexa to control your devices in the same way you do with the app.
